languages.text: {n}Мужчина смотрит на вас в упор: он до белых костяшек вцепился в трость, свою последнюю опору.{/n} "Я — честный слуга Империума. Но если Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} считает меня недостойным... Не смею возражать". {n}За вашей спиной одобрительно переговариваются обвинители.{/n}

{n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина смотрит на вас в упор: он до белых костяшек вцепился в трость, свою последнюю опору.{/n} "Я — честный слуга Империума. Но если Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} считает меня недостойным... Не смею возражать". {n}За вашей спиной одобрительно переговариваются обвинители.{/n}

However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

{n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人看着你的眼睛，紧紧握住他的手杖——他最后的支撑，握得指关节都发白了。{/n}“我是帝国光荣的仆人。然而，如果来自上界的大人认为我没有价值……我也绝对不会反驳。”{n}你听到那些指控他的人在你身后窃窃私语。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人看着你的眼睛，紧紧握住他的手杖——他最后的支撑，握得指关节都发白了。{/n}“我是帝国光荣的仆人。然而，如果来自上界的大人认为我没有价值……我也绝对不会反驳。”{n}你听到那些指控他的人在你身后窃窃私语。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その老人はあなたの目をまっすぐ見つめ、最後の支えである杖を白くなるほど強く握りしめた。{/n}「私は帝国に仕える誇り高き臣下です。しかし、もし天の{mf|君|姫}が私を不適格とお見なしになるのであれば…私は一言の抗議もいたしません」{n}背後では、彼を告発していた者たちが満足げにざわめいているのが聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その老人はあなたの目をまっすぐ見つめ、最後の支えである杖を白くなるほど強く握りしめた。{/n}「私は帝国に仕える誇り高き臣下です。しかし、もし天の{mf|君|姫}が私を不適格とお見なしになるのであれば…私は一言の抗議もいたしません」{n}背後では、彼を告発していた者たちが満足げにざわめいているのが聞こえる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El anciano te mira a los ojos y aprieta con fuerza su bastón, su único apoyo, hasta que los nudillos se le ponen blancos.{/n} «Soy un honorable siervo del Imperium. Pero si mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial no me considera digno... no pronunciaré una sola palabra de protesta». {n}Detrás de ti, oyes a sus detractores aprobar su decisión entre murmullos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano te mira a los ojos y aprieta con fuerza su bastón, su único apoyo, hasta que los nudillos se le ponen blancos.{/n} «Soy un honorable siervo del Imperium. Pero si mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial no me considera digno... no pronunciaré una sola palabra de protesta». {n}Detrás de ti, oyes a sus detractores aprobar su decisión entre murmullos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam, gözlerinin içine bakıp son desteği olan bastonunu sıkıca kavrıyor.{/n} "Ben İmparatorluk'un şerefli bir hizmetkârıyım. Ancak Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} beni buna layık görmezse... Karşı çıkmam, tek kelime etmem." {n}Arkandan onu suçlayanların mırıldandığını duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı adam, gözlerinin içine bakıp son desteği olan bastonunu sıkıca kavrıyor.{/n} "Ben İmparatorluk'un şerefli bir hizmetkârıyım. Ancak Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} beni buna layık görmezse... Karşı çıkmam, tek kelime etmem." {n}Arkandan onu suçlayanların mırıldandığını duyuyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme âgé vous regarde droit dans les yeux et serre si fort la canne qui le soutient que ses jointures en blanchissent.{/n} « Je suis un honorable serviteur de l'Imperium. Mais si Votre Céleste Seigneurie me juge indigne de mon rang... je n'élèverai aucune protestation. » {n}Vous entendez les murmures approbateurs de ses accusateurs derrière vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme âgé vous regarde droit dans les yeux et serre si fort la canne qui le soutient que ses jointures en blanchissent.{/n} « Je suis un honorable serviteur de l'Imperium. Mais si Votre Céleste Seigneurie me juge indigne de mon rang... je n'élèverai aucune protestation. » {n}Vous entendez les murmures approbateurs de ses accusateurs derrière vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann sieht dir in die Augen und umklammert seinen Stock, seinen letzten Halt, bis seine Fingerknochen weiß hervortreten.{/n} "Ich bin ein ehrbarer Diener des Imperiums. Doch wenn {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} mich für unwürdig hält ... werde ich kein Wort des Protests äußern." {n}Du hörst hinter deinem Rücken ein zustimmendes Murmeln seiner Ankläger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks you in the eye and grasps his cane, his last support, until his knuckles turn white.{/n} "I am an honourable servant of the Imperium. However, if my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} deems me unworthy... I shan't say a word in protest." {n}You hear his accusers murmuring in approval behind your back.{/n}

Doch wenn {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} mich für unwürdig hält ... werde ich kein Wort des Protests äußern." {n}Du hörst hinter deinem Rücken ein zustimmendes Murmeln seiner Ankläger.{/n}
